EJyVaoWWvaFr2MaM.name: Raging Storm: Blind, Deaf, Verbal Components

mmAbduct00000000.name: Abduct
mmAbduct00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] needn’t spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

mmAberrantGround.name: Aberrant Ground
mmAberrantGround.description: The ground in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zVznqPXgYjETqpQz]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name]] is &Reference[Difficult Terrain].

mmAbsorbBody0000.name: Absorb Body
mmAbsorbBody0000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet.

Failure: The target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space and becomes grafted to its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target grafted at a time.

While grafted, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and Disadvantage on Constitution saving throws. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the grafted target moves with it. If [[lookup @activation.condition activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]], its body is destroyed, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]] Hit Points.

The grafted target or a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc format=long]]. On a successful check, the target is no longer grafted and moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmAcidAbsorption.name: Acid Absorption
mmAcidAbsorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to &Reference[Acid] damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

mmAcidBreath0000.name: Acid Breath
mmAcidBreath0000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmAcidSpray00000.name: Acid Spray
mmAcidSpray00000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

mmAdhesive000000.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
mmAdhesive000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.

mmAdvancedTelepa.name: Advanced Telepathy
mmAdvancedTelepa.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] perceives the content of any telepathic communication within 60 feet of it.

mmAgile000000000.name: Agile
mmAgile000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke an &Reference[opportunityattacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it moves out of an enemy’s reach.

mmAim00000000000.name: Aim
mmAim00000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn.

mmAirForm0000000.name: Air Form
mmAirForm0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmorphous00000.name: Amorphous
mmAmorphous00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmphibious0000.name: Amphibious
mmAmphibious0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

mmAnimalLordship.name: Animal Lordship
mmAnimalLordship.description:
An [[lookup @name lowercase]] represents a Forager, Hunter, or Sage (DM’s choice), which determines certain traits in this stat block.

Appearance Tables

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmForagerAnimalL rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{Forager Animal Lord Appearances}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmHunterAnimalLo rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{Hunter Animal Lord Appearances}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmSageAnimalLord rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{Sage Animal Lord Appearances}

mmAnimalSpirit00.name: Animal Spirit
mmAnimalSpirit00.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures an animal spirit that strikes at a creature and then disappears. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: One of the following effects occurs:

Fortify (Forager Only). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=emHqEek8e9Mwyaj7]] Temporary Hit Points.

Marked as Prey (Hunter Only). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Pesky Swarm (Sage Only). The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

mmAnimateBoulder.name: Animate Boulders
mmAnimateBoulder.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] animates [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] feet of itself. Each boulder uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGalebDuhr00000] stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1 and lacks this action. The boulder takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A boulder remains animate for [[lookup @duration.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] minute or until it or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

mmAnimateTrees00.name: Animate Trees
mmAnimateTrees00.description: The [[lookup @name]] magically animates up to two trees it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=EceTNjzjKWdrMNAy]] feet of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

mmAnimatingSpore.name: Animating Spores
mmAnimatingSpore.description: The [[lookup @name]] releases spores at a Medium or Small corpse within [[lookup @range.value activity=ruh9QGSrxWb57Iuf]] feet of it that wasn't a Construct or an Undead. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a Myconid Spore Servant. The corpse stays animate for [[/r 1d4 + 1]] weeks or until destroyed, and it can't be animated again in this way.

mmAntennae000000.name: Antennae
mmAntennae000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] object—armor or a weapon—worn or carried by a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] feet of itself. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]], the creature with the object. Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides a Damaged Enchantment effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that the equipment penalty can be applied multiple times, the enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effects tab onto the target Item's sheet.

mmAntimagicCone0.name: Antimagic Cone
mmAntimagicCone0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s central eye emits an antimagic wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]] [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]. Until the start of the beholder’s next turn, that area acts as an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAntimagicF] spell, and that area works against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s own Eye Rays.

mmAquaticBurst00.name: Aquatic Burst
mmAquaticBurst00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

mmAquaticCharge0.name: Aquatic Charge
mmAquaticCharge0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swims up to its Swim Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

mmArcaneProwl000.name: Arcane Prowl
mmArcaneProwl000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport up to [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

mmArcaneTentacle.name: Arcane Tentacles
mmArcaneTentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport the target up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see on a surface or liquid large enough to support the target. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and magically devours its brain.

mmAstralImplosio.name: Astral Implosion
mmAstralImplosio.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it. In [[/r 1d20#Years]] years, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane.

mmAttach00000000.name: Attach
mmAttach00000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to it. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Bite attacks against other targets. In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] feet of it can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]], doing so by succeeding on a DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] Strength (Athletics) check.

mmAuraOfAuthorit.name: Aura of Authority
mmAuraOfAuthorit.description: While in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dE4lg9tZyXtoCb5x]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

mmAuraOfBravery0.name: Aura of Bravery
mmAuraOfBravery0.description: Creatures of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=N8uK4xdPCXdknRTb]]-foot Emanation originating from it have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

mmAvalancheSlam0.name: Avalanche Slam
mmAvalancheSlam0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=M8ntOH8iSnEUaYhj]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=M8ntOH8iSnEUaYhj]] straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage and has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

mmAversionToFire.name: Aversion to Fire
mmAversionToFire.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

mmAvoidance00000.name: Avoidance
mmAvoidance00000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and half damage if it fails. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

mmAwestruck00000.name: Awestruck
mmAwestruck00000.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBalefulCommand.name: Baleful Command
mmBalefulCommand.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBanish00000000.name: Banish
mmBanish00000000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, at which point it re­appears in an unoccupied space of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again [[lookup @duration.special activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]].

mmBanishingClaw0.name: Banishing Claw
mmBanishingClaw0.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTrsaQFwVagWU19h]].

Failure: The target is trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome. While trapped there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=cha]] save, escaping the tome on a success. When the target escapes, it appears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

If the target fails three of these saves while in the demiplane, it becomes bound to the tome and can escape only if the tome is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

mmBarbedHide0000.name: Barbed Hide
mmBarbedHide0000.description: At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1O5eyc72vPW0UxYZ]].

mmBeaks000000000.name: Beaks
mmBeaks000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]

mmBeard000000000.name: Beard
mmBeard000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

mmBeastOfBurden0.name: Beast of Burden
mmBeastOfBurden0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

mmBeguile0000000.name: Beguile
mmBeguile0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmBeguilingSong0.name: Beguiling Song
mmBeguilingSong0.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmBeguilingStrik.name: Beguiling Strike
mmBeguilingStrik.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmBerserk0000000.name: Berserk
mmBerserk0000000.description:
Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn &Reference[Bloodied], roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s creator, if within [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] feet of the berserk [[lookup @name lowercase]], can try to calm it by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]] DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check; the golem must be able to hear its creator. If this check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk until the start of its next turn, at which point it resumes rolling for the Berserk trait again if it is still Bloodied.

mmBites000000000.name: Bites
mmBites000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]]

mmBlazingLight00.name: Blazing Light
mmBlazingLight00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast [[/item Scorching Ray]]

mmBlazingMovemen.name: Blazing Movement
mmBlazingMovemen.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]. During this movement, fire fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. When the Emanation enters a creature’s space, that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage. A creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]].

mmBlightSeeds000.name: Blight Seeds
mmBlightSeeds000.description:
When it finishes a Long Rest, the blight expels [[/r 1d6#Seeds expelled]] seeds into unoccupied spaces on the ground within 30 feet of itself. After 24 hours, the seeds become creatures under the blight’s control. Roll 1d8 for each seed to determine the creature it becomes:

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmBlightSeedCrea rollable classes="caption-top"]

mmBlindingBreath.name: Blinding Breath
mmBlindingBreath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]]-foot Cone. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBlindingFlash0.name: Blinding Flash
mmBlindingFlash0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmBlindingGaze00.name: Blinding Gaze
mmBlindingGaze00.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmBlindingSpittl.name: Blinding Spittle
mmBlindingSpittl.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmBloodFrenzy000.name: Blood Frenzy
mmBloodFrenzy000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its Hit Points.

mmBloodiedFrenzy.name: Bloodied Frenzy
mmBloodiedFrenzy.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

mmBloodiedFury00.name: Bloodied Fury
mmBloodiedFury00.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls.

mmBlurredForm000.name: Blurred Form
mmBlurredForm000.description: Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are made with Disadvantage unless the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

mmBolster0000000.name: Bolster
mmBolster0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=v5km8Vio4N6HgkF6]] Temporary Hit Points, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and each ally within [[lookup @range.value activity=v5km8Vio4N6HgkF6]] feet of it gain Advantage on D20 Tests until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmBoneWhip000000.name: Bone Whip
mmBoneWhip000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target can’t make &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmBoulder0000000.name: Boulder
mmBoulder0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

mmBoulderToss000.name: Boulder Toss
mmBoulderToss000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] hurls a boulder at a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]] feet.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point.

Failure: [[/damage average]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

mmBound000000000.name: Bound
mmBound000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is magically bound to an amulet. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet’s wearer can telepathically call the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to travel to it, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 60 feet of the amulet’s wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (round up) is transferred to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmBrutalGore0000.name: Brutal Gore
mmBrutalGore0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmBubbleDash0000.name: Bubble Dash
mmBubbleDash0000.description: While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

mmBurn0000000000.name: Burn
mmBurn0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it starts &Reference[burning].

mmBurstOfWonder0.name: Burst of Wonder
mmBurstOfWonder0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]{Polymorph}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTashasHide]{Tasha's Hideous Laughter}, requiring no Material components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmBurstofIngenui.name: Burst of Ingenuity
mmBurstofIngenui.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name]] or another creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=AyYipNx3cFaXA0LU]] feet makes an ability check or a saving throw. Response: The sphinx adds 2 to the roll.

mmCacophony00000.name: Cacophony
mmCacophony00000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pyvvXqoxJsjkkP38]], one creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Deafened, the target also has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

mmCaptainsCharm0.name: Captain’s Charm
mmCaptainsCharm0.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmCaptivated0000.name: Captivated
mmCaptivated0000.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

mmCataclysmicEve.name: Cataclysmic Event
mmCataclysmicEve.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates one of the following effects at random (roll [[/r 1d4#Cataclysmic Event]]):

1: Clinging Flames. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: The target starts &Reference[burning].

2: Freezing Waves. Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]]-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: The target’s Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn.

3: Raging Storm. A storm cloud fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]] feet. The cloud lasts for 1 minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Cataclysmic Event again. Creatures entirely in the cloud have the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions and can’t cast spells with a Verbal component. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]], each creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. Failure: [[/damage average activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]] damage. Success: Half damage.

4: Swallowing Earth. Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]]-foot Cube originating from a point on the ground within [[lookup @range.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition and is buried under rubble. A buried target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, has &Reference[Total Cover], and is &Reference[suffocating]. As an action, a buried creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]]. On a successful check, the creature is no longer buried. Success: Half damage only.

mmCelestialResto.name: Celestial Restoration
mmCelestialResto.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it returns to life in [[/r 1d6#Days]] days and regains all its Hit Points unless @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil] is cast on its remains.

mmChain000000000.name: Chain
mmChain000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two chains, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmChaosBlade0000.name: Chaos Blade
mmChaosBlade0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a 1, &Reference[Charmed apply=false]; on a 2, &Reference[Frightened apply=false]; on a 3, &Reference[Poisoned apply=false]; or on a 4, &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false].

mmChaosClaw00000.name: Chaos Claw
mmChaosClaw00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a 1, &Reference[Charmed apply=false]; on a 2, &Reference[Frightened apply=false]; on a 3, &Reference[Poisoned apply=false]; or on a 4, &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false].

mmChaosStaff0000.name: Chaos Staff
mmChaosStaff0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a 1, &Reference[Charmed apply=false]; on a 2, &Reference[Frightened apply=false]; on a 3, &Reference[Poisoned apply=false]; or on a 4, &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false].

mmCharge00000000.name: Charge
mmCharge00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to [[lookup @range.special activity=Y2IncZu5BjB42z7l]] straight toward an enemy it can see.

mmChargedTendril.name: Charged Tendril
mmChargedTendril.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls the target 5 feet straight toward itself.

mmChargingHorn00.name: Charging Horn
mmChargingHorn00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks], and it makes one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

mmCharm000000000.name: Charm
mmCharm000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]), and the duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=fcRXSTOlFJShCl52]] hours. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target is a willing recipient of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Bite]], the damage of which doesn’t end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmCharming000000.name: Charming
mmCharming000000.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=xc46oIdnDPdbeXVN]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=xc46oIdnDPdbeXVN]]. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and uses all its movement to dance in place. The effect ends on the target if it takes any damage.

mmChill000000000.name: Chill
mmChill000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]. The dragon can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmChillingGaze00.name: Chilling Gaze
mmChillingGaze00.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EREXmcv7YU7T9pj6]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=EREXmcv7YU7T9pj6]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn unless the target has Immunity to Cold damage. Success: The target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

mmChromaticSpitt.name: Chromatic Spittle
mmChromaticSpitt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] (type chosen by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]).

mmCinderBreath00.name: Cinder Breath
mmCinderBreath00.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tb7VfYTYKzOxuE5S]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tb7VfYTYKzOxuE5S]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmClaws000000000.name: Claws
mmClaws000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmCloakedFlight0.name: Cloaked Flight
mmCloakedFlight0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili] on itself, and it can fly up to half its Fly Speed. The dragon can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmClockworkBlade.name: Clockwork Blade
mmClockworkBlade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The blade magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmClockworkSpear.name: Clockwork Spear
mmClockworkSpear.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmCloudOfInsects.name: Cloud of Insects
mmCloudOfInsects.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has Disadvantage on saving throws to maintain &Reference[Concentration} until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmColdBreath0000.name: Cold Breath
mmColdBreath0000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmColdGale000000.name: Cold Gale
mmColdGale000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCommandingPres.name: Commanding Presence
mmCommandingPres.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command} (level 2 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.
mmCommandingPres.chat: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast Command (level 2 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCompression000.name: Compression
mmCompression000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmConferFireResi.name: Confer Fire Resistance
mmConferFireResi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmConfusingGaze0.name: Confusing Gaze
mmConfusingGaze0.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]]-foot Cone. Failure: The target can’t take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a random creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

mmConjureInferna.name: Conjure Infernal Chain
mmConjureInferna.description:
The devil conjures a fiery chain to bind a creature.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, at which point the chain disappears. If the target is Large or smaller, the devil moves the target up to 30 feet straight toward itself.

Success: The chain disappears.

mmConjuredDragon.name: Conjured Dragon’s Breath
mmConjuredDragon.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]] Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

mmConstrict00000.name: Constrict
mmConstrict00000.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmConstrictingVi.name: Constricting Vine
mmConstrictingVi.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target takes [[/damage average activity=7voODpkc7vuuouqM]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Constricting Vine attacks.

mmConsumeLife000.name: Consume Life
mmConsumeLife000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]] feet. that has 0 Hit Points. Failure: The target dies, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[/healing average activity=1waYTjY3NAIGZgrI]].

mmConsumeMemorie.name: Consume Memories
mmConsumeMemorie.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] feet. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] damage. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains the target’s memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this action.

mmContortionist0.name: Contortionist
mmContortionist0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmControlWeather.name: Control Weather
mmControlWeather.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWea]{Control Weather} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability.

mmCorrosiveForm0.name: Corrosive Form
mmCorrosiveForm0.description:
A creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack roll takes [[/damage average]] damage. Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative −1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches −5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the weapon.

In 1 minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can eat through 2 feet of nonmagical wood or metal.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Attack Penalty active effect that will modify a targeted weapon. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times to multiple nonmagical weapons, this active effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target Item's weapons.

mmCounterattack0.name: Counterattack
mmCounterattack0.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one Greatsword or Longbow attack against the attacker.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

mmCounterspell00.name: Counterspell
mmCounterspell00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmCovenMagic0000.name: Coven Magic
mmCovenMagic0000.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell’s normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{Unseen Servant}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

mmCracklingWave0.name: Crackling Wave
mmCracklingWave0.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ZtSx3SmaUHh2Ws7L]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ZtSx3SmaUHh2Ws7L]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The target is cursed until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The target can’t take Reactions until the curse ends.

mmCreateSpecter0.name: Create Specter
mmCreateSpecter0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets a Humanoid corpse within [[lookup @range.value activity=ypIQdXr13u7LATUP]] feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target’s spirit rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSpecter0000000]{Specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.

mmCreateWhirlwin.name: Create Whirlwind
mmCreateWhirlwin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a whirlwind at a point it can see within 120 feet. The whirlwind fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-high [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] centered on that point. The whirlwind lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration on it ends. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns.

Whenever the whirlwind enters a creature’s space or a creature enters the whirlwind, that creature is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] (a creature makes this save only once per turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected).

Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes [[/damage average]] damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

mmCrush000000000.name: Crush
mmCrush000000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] had Advantage on the attack roll, it covers the target, which has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition and is &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{suffocating} while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached in this way.

While attached to a target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can attack only the target but has Advantage on its attack rolls. Its Speed becomes 0, it can’t benefit from any bonus to its Speed, and it moves with the target.

A creature can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] from itself, doing so with a successful [[/check format=long]]. On its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement.

mmCunningAction0.name: Cunning Action
mmCunningAction0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash apply=false], the &Reference[Disengage apply=false], or &Reference[Hide apply=false] action.

mmCurseOfTheRidd.name: Curse of the Riddle
mmCurseOfTheRidd.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is cursed with a riddle. The cursed target has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls. In addition, if it takes the Magic action, it must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or that action is wasted.

The cursed target can take a &Reference[Study] action to make a [[/check dc=15 ability=int format=long]], solving the riddle and ending the curse on a success. The curse ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] curses another target.

mmCursedTouch000.name: Cursed Touch
mmCursedTouch000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

mmDarknessAura00.name: Darkness Aura
mmDarknessAura00.description: Magical Darkness fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=amat5Ii4NydseA0h]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name]]. This effect lasts while the [[lookup @name]] maintains Concentration on it, up to [[lookup @duration.value activity=amat5Ii4NydseA0h]] minutes. Darkvision can’t penetrate this area, and no light can illuminate it.

mmDeadlyAim00000.name: Deadly Aim
mmDeadlyAim00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gives itself Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn. If that attack hits, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

mmDeadlyLeap0000.name: Deadly Leap
mmDeadlyLeap0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spends 5 feet of movement to jump to a space within 15 feet that contains one or more Large or smaller creatures.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IPCXEQoTuaAG5l52]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IPCXEQoTuaAG5l52]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmDeathBurst0000.name: Death Burst
mmDeathBurst0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

mmDeathGlare0000.name: Death Glare
mmDeathGlare0000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] feet.

Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmDeathThroes000.name: Death Throes
mmDeathThroes000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes when it dies.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jTq2czA8KQITUK4c]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jTq2czA8KQITUK4c]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Failure or Success: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

mmDeathlessAgili.name: Deathless Agility
mmDeathlessAgili.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action.

mmDeathlessStrik.name: Deathless Strike
mmDeathlessStrik.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Grave Strike attack.

mmDeathlyTelepor.name: Deathly Teleport
mmDeathlyTelepor.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]]. mmDivineRay00000.name: Divine Ray

The target repeats the save whenever it takes damage as well as after every 24 hours it spends at least 1 mile away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], ending the effect on itself on a success.

mmDraconicStrike.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect in the Effects Tab to modify the target PC's Strength Score. Since this Strength reduction can be applied multiple times, the GM must drag the Active Effect in this item's Effect tab onto the PC's character sheet. From there, the GM must navigate to the Effects tab on the PC's sheet to modify the Effect Value preceded by the negative symbol, e.g., -3. Presently, it is set at -1.

mmElementalResto.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @item.requirements]], its body dissolves into dirt, and it gains a new body in [[/r 1d4#Days]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Earth.

mmEnergyDrain000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3jwFie9se3ZA1RvG]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=3jwFie9se3ZA1RvG]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3jwFie9se3ZA1RvG]] feet. Failure: The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by 14 ([[/r 4d6]]). Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmEngulf00000000.name: Engulf
mmEngulf00000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], each creature or object whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters for the first time during this move.

Failure: The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed.

While engulfed, a creature takes [[/damage average activity=Exfa4q7O4SvXjGt7]] damage at the start of each of its turns, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=long] condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. An engulfed creature that is reduced to 0 Hit Points dissolves into ash, which is ejected into the Astral Sea.

Success: The target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

mmEntanglingPlan.name: Entangling Plants
mmEntanglingPlan.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00] spell, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.con.dc]]).

mmEntanglingRope.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=n8nEah4vbrEPphNF]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=n8nEah4vbrEPphNF]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the rope is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses a Bonus Action to release the target, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Entangling Rope again.

Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as it moves is targeted once by the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmEnthrallingPan.name: Enthralling Panache
mmEnthrallingPan.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmEphemeral00000.name: Ephemeral
mmEphemeral00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t wear or carry anything.

mmEruption000000.name: Eruption
mmEruption000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Elemental Burst attack.

mmEtherealJaunt0.name: Ethereal Jaunt
mmEtherealJaunt0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa.

mmEtherealSight0.name: Ethereal Sight
mmEtherealSight0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

mmEtherealStride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and up to [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] [[lookup @range.units activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]]. of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

mmEtherealness00.name: Etherealness
mmEtherealness00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

mmEuphoriaBreath.name: Euphoria Breath
mmEuphoriaBreath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], it succeeds automatically. While Incapacitated, the target uses all its movement on each of its turns to move in a random direction.

mmEvasion0000000.name: Evasion
mmEvasion0000000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

mmExaltedRestora.name: Exalted Restoration
mmExaltedRestora.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

mmExtractBrain00.name: Extract Brain
mmExtractBrain00.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] that is Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Tentacles. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] damage. Failure or Success: If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and devours its brain.

mmEyeRays0000000.name: Eye Rays
mmEyeRays0000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll [[/r 1d10]]; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

Eye Rays

1: Charm Ray. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] or until it takes damage. Success: Half damage only.

2: Paralyzing Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]], it succeeds automatically.

3: Fear Ray. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

4: Slowing Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]] damage. Until the end of the target’s next turn, the target’s Speed is halved; the target can’t take &Reference[Reaction]{Reactions}; and it can take either an action or a &Reference[BonusAction] on its turn, not both. Success: Half damage only.

5: Enervation Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points. Success: Half damage only.

6: Telekinetic Ray. Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] (the target succeeds automatically if it is Gargantuan). Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves the target up to [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]]. in any direction. The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn or until the beholder has the Incapacitated condition.
