mmHellfireSpellc.name: Hellfire Spellcasting
mmHellfireSpellc.description: The pit fiend casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).. It can replace one Fireball with @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster} (level 7 version) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}.

mmHellishRebuke0.name: Hellish Rebuke
mmHellishRebuke0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHellishReb]{Hellish Rebuke} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmHellishRestora.name: Hellish Restoration
mmHellishRestora.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in [[/r 1d10]] days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

mmHoldBreath0000.name: Hold Breath
mmHoldBreath0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold its breath for {N} {Units}.

mmHolyBurst00000.name: Holy Burst
mmHolyBurst00000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

mmHolyWord000000.name: Holy Word
mmHolyWord000000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=hDo31s3Eg9EW7GUZ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=hDo31s3Eg9EW7GUZ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=hDo31s3Eg9EW7GUZ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

mmHook0000000000.name: Hook
mmHook0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves the target 5 feet straight toward or away from itself.

mmHorrificNecros.name: Horrific Necrosis
mmHorrificNecros.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmHorrificVisage.name: Horrific Visage
mmHorrificVisage.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]]-foot Cone that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and isn’t an Undead. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

mmHorrify0000000.name: Horrify
mmHorrify0000000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] [[lookup @range.units activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

mmHorrorNimbus00.name: Horror Nimbus
mmHorrorNimbus00.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] out of line of sight.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

mmHowl0000000000.name: Howl
mmHowl0000000000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure or Success: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmHungerOfHadar0.name: Hunger of Hadar
mmHungerOfHadar0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa]{Hunger of Hadar} (level 5 version), requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).

mmHungerOfYeenog.name: Hunger of Yeenoghu
mmHungerOfYeenog.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] of magical Darkness originating from a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] [[lookup @range.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]., which lasts for [[lookup @duration.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s &Reference[Concentration] ends on it. This area is &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] that starts its turn in this area or enters it for the first time on a turn.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or a creature of its choice it can see gains [[/healing activity=DXSz02tEbmOq9fOu]] Hit Points.

Success: Half damage.

mmHurlFlame00000.name: Hurl Flame
mmHurlFlame00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a flammable object that isn’t being worn or carried, it starts burning.

mmHypnoticGaze00.name: Hypnotic Gaze
mmHypnoticGaze00.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

mmIceSpear000000.name: Ice Spear
mmIceSpear000000.description:
[[/attack extended]].

Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can’t take a &Reference[Bonus Action] or &Reference[Reaction], its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both.

Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmIceWalk0000000.name: Ice Walk
mmIceWalk0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[Difficult Terrain] composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

mmIceWall0000000.name: Ice Wall
mmIceWall0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

mmIcyBite0000000.name: Icy Bite
mmIcyBite0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmIgnitedIllumin.name: Ignited Illumination
mmIgnitedIllumin.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

mmIllumination00.name: Illumination
mmIllumination00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a {m}-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional {n} feet.

mmIllusoryAppear.name: Illusory Appearance
mmIllusoryAppear.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]). The spell’s duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]]s.

mmInciteRampage0.name: Incite Rampage
mmInciteRampage0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets another [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] feet of itself [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]]. The target can take a &Reference[Reaction] to make one melee attack.

mmIncorporealMov.name: Incorporeal Movement
mmIncorporealMov.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

mmIncubusForm000.name: Incubus Form
mmIncubusForm000.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmIncubus0000000]{Incubus}, using that stat block instead of this one.

mmInfernalGlaive.name: Infernal Glaive
mmInfernalGlaive.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature and doesn’t already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=4qy3fKL086OAE1xR]]. Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=IS4utGV80LpDrjvt]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=KNWa0TFhANjmQCds]].

mmInfernalSting0.name: Infernal Sting
mmInfernalSting0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

mmInfernalTail00.name: Infernal Tail
mmInfernalTail00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @range.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn’t have one. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=zZfCQ0IeJZCjPLzE]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after [[lookup @duration.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check dc=17 ability=wis skill=med format=long]].

mmInfernoBlast00.name: Inferno Blast
mmInfernoBlast00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-radius [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] damage, and the target starts burning, taking [[/damage average activity=cuIDOQ2o3dMRhqzd]] damage at the start of each of its turns instead of the normal burning damage. The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that effect can be applied multiple times, the effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target item's sheet each time the target gains a level of exhaustion after the initial level is applied.

mmInjectingClaw0.name: Injecting Claw
mmInjectingClaw0.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C5wp4BSKfYlbMurm]]. Failure: The target is cursed unawares, and a minuscule slaad egg is implanted in it. Removing the curse destroys the egg.

Over [[/r 2d4*10#Days egg gestates]]{2d4 × 10} days, the egg gestates. In the final 24 hours, the cursed target feels unwell; its Speed is halved, and it has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. At the end of this time, the egg turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSlaadTadpole00]{Slaad Tadpole}, which chews out of the host and kills it.

mmInkCloud000000.name: Ink Cloud
mmInkCloud000000.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage while underwater.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases ink that fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1MiIPcVuCpfgBIkS]]-foot Cube centered on itself, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

mmInscrutable000.name: Inscrutable
mmInscrutable000.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

mmInvisibility00.name: Invisibility
mmInvisibility00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

mmInvisibleInWat.name: Invisible in Water
mmInvisibleInWat.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Invisible] condition while fully immersed in water.

mmInvitation0000.name: Invitation
mmInvitation0000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target is teleported inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and swallowed. A swallowed [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Hit Points, a swallowed [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] can leave the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the Plane Shift spell.

mmIronScent00000.name: Iron Scent
mmIronScent00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] feet of itself.

mmJinx0000000000.name: Jinx
mmJinx0000000000.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see hits it with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=02KFzL9fElzyHOIT]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack misses instead.

mmJumper00000000.name: Jumper
mmJumper00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.

mmLash0000000000.name: Lash
mmLash0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Tentacle attack.

mmLashingGoop000.name: Lashing Goop
mmLashingGoop000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Pseudopod attack.

mmLeap0000000000.name: Leap
mmLeap0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

mmLegendaryResis.name: Legendary Resistance
mmLegendaryResis.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

mmLifeDrain00000.name: Life Drain
mmLifeDrain00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

mmLifeSuppressio.name: Life Suppression
mmLifeSuppressio.description: Creatures within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=n7LC7M3BMXe8n2Ro]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t regain Hit Points.

mmLifedrainingRo.name: Life-Draining Root
mmLifedrainingRo.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] [[lookup @range.units activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and takes [[/damage average activity=y8c5uBc58T7dKgQf]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

mmLightSensitivi.name: Light Sensitivity
mmLightSensitivi.description: While in Bright Light, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

mmLightningAbsor.name: Lightning Absorption
mmLightningAbsor.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

mmLightningBlade.name: Lightning Blade
mmLightningBlade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target can’t take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmLightningBreat.name: Lightning Breath
mmLightningBreat.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
mmLightningStorm.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-feet-high Cylinder originating from a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStrik.name: Lightning Strike
mmLightningStrik.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success:Half damage.

mmLimitedAmphibi.name: Limited Amphibiousness
mmLimitedAmphibi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

mmLimitedForesig.name: Limited Foresight
mmLimitedForesig.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see makes an attack roll against it.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] imposes Disadvantage on the roll, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmLivingShadow00.name: Living Shadow
mmLivingShadow00.description:
While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

mmLoathsomeLimbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
mmLoathsomeLimbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l’s limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

mmLordlyPresence.name: Lordly Presence
mmLordlyPresence.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]] that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target suffers one of the following effects:

Captivated (Forager Only). The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Fearful (Hunter Only). The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Mired (Sage Only). The target takes [[/damage average activity=hYhryWdKIuHOzmO3]] damage, and the target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

mmLunge000000000.name: Lunge
mmLunge000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Dread Blade attack.

mmLuringSong0000.name: Luring Song
mmLuringSong0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody, which lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration ends on it.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the song starts.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies.

If the target is more than 5 feet from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target moves on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It doesn’t avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target repeats the save.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Luring Song for 24 hours.

mmMagicOfTheSpid.name: Magic of the Spider Queen
mmMagicOfTheSpid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{Web}, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmMagicResistanc.name: Magic Resistance
mmMagicResistanc.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

mmMagicRope00000.name: Magic Rope
mmMagicRope00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic rope. While bearing it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use the Entangling Rope action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour or more, or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

mmMagicalBacklas.name: Magical Backlash
mmMagicalBacklas.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals damage to it.

Response—Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMajesticSong00.name: Majestic Song
mmMajesticSong00.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] or &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice) until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmMaliciousMagic.name: Malicious Magic
mmMaliciousMagic.description: Malicious Magic. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa]{Hypnotic Pattern}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmManeuver000000.name: Maneuver
mmManeuver000000.description: One [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=WMz2y2H5SLCDAxCF]] who can see or hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take a Reaction to move up to half the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=WMz2y2H5SLCDAxCF]]’s Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

mmMarkedAsPrey00.name: Marked as Prey
mmMarkedAsPrey00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmMarshalUndead0.description: [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=WbzFmVAOPQ7eL6IW]] creatures of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice (excluding itself) in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=WbzFmVAOPQ7eL6IW]]-foot Emanation originating from it have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

[[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The axe magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmMimicry0000000.name: Mimicry
mmMimicry0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful [[/check format=long]].

mmMindCorrosion0.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw against a spell or another magical effect created by a creature. Response: The triggering creature takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMindInvasion00.description: The dragon uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{Mind Spike} (level 3 version).

mmMindJolt000000.name: Mind Jolt
mmMindJolt000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{Mind Spike} (level 4 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmMindrendingRoa.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]]. mmMired000000000.name: Mired
mmMired000000000.description: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

mmMistyEscape000.name: Misty Escape
mmMistyEscape000.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can’t use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can’t return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

mmMistyStep00000.name: Misty Step
mmMistyStep00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmMistyVeil00000.name: Misty Veil
mmMistyVeil00000.description: The marid casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmMoan0000000000.name: Moan
mmMoan0000000000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Moan for the next 24 hours.

mmMockery0000000.name: Mockery
mmMockery0000000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMucusCloud0000.name: Mucus Cloud
mmMucusCloud0000.description:
While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by mucus.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target’s skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can’t regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=JrxCVyCOsBAMVZS7]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

mmMudBreath00000.name: Mud Breath
mmMudBreath00000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmMultipleHeads0.name: Multiple Heads
mmMultipleHeads0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

mmMutatingClaw00.name: Mutating Claw
mmMutatingClaw00.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zy66rXdo6Mo4E9bO]]. Failure: The target is cursed. The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

If the curse reduces the target’s Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmRedSlaad000000]{Red Slaad} or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGreenSlaad0000]{Green Slaad}. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can reverse this transformation.

mmNecrosis000000.name: Necrosis
mmNecrosis000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Necrotic Burst attack.

mmNecroticBreath.name: Necrotic Breath
mmNecroticBreath.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3LncbUYMp4rOrQ3U]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=3LncbUYMp4rOrQ3U]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=3LncbUYMp4rOrQ3U]]-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

mmNegativeEnergy.name: Negative Energy Cone
mmNegativeEnergy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s central eye emits an imperceptible, magical wave of negative energy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TLqcxF6OYH0LweRo]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=TLqcxF6OYH0LweRo]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TLqcxF6OYH0LweRo]]. [[lookup @target.affects.type capitalize activity=TLqcxF6OYH0LweRo]]s in that area can’t regain Hit Points until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. An intact Humanoid corpse there instantly rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmZombie00000000]{Zombie} under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control and takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on the same initiative count.

mmNightmare00000.name: Nightmare
mmNightmare00000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] feet. Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmNightmareHaunt.name: Nightmare Haunting
mmNightmareHaunt.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell’s messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s soul bag, and the target can’t be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

mmNightmareRay00.name: Nightmare Ray
mmNightmareRay00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmNimbleEscape00.name: Nimble Escape
mmNimbleEscape00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Disengage] or &Reference[Hide] action.

mmNoxiousMiasma0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] feet.

mmOnslaught00000.name: Onslaught
mmOnslaught00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Claw or Tail attack.

mmOozeCube000000.name: Ooze Cube
mmOozeCube000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Engulf and has Disadvantage on the saving throw.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have &Reference[Total Cover], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time.

As an action, a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature or an object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check dc=12 ability=str skill=ath format=long]], and the puller takes [[/damage average activity=PMCvyqxfUYiPzNK8]] damage.

mmOtherworldlySt.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice).

After [[lookup @duration.value activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]] minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmPackTactics000.name: Pack Tactics
mmPackTactics000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

mmParalysisGas00.name: Paralysis Gas
mmParalysisGas00.description:
Constitution Saving Throws: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]], it succeeds automatically.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]]-foot Cone.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmParalyzingTent.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
mmParalyzingTent.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmParalyzingTouc.name: Paralyzing Touch
mmParalyzingTouc.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmParry000000000.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

mmPeskySwarm0000.description: The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

mmPetrifyingBite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=udF9lrpAQMvL0b9J]].

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPetrifyingBrea.name: Petrifying Breath
mmPetrifyingBrea.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]]-foot Cone.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPetrifyingGaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
mmPetrifyingGaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sees its reflection in the [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make this save.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPhantasms00000.name: Phantasms
mmPhantasms00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMirrorImag]{Mirror Image} spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

mmPincer00000000.name: Pincer
mmPincer00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two pincers.

mmPincerStaff000.name: Pincer Staff
mmPincerStaff000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Pincer Staff attacks.

mmPoison00000000.name: Poison
mmPoison00000000.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]].

Success: Half damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target’s Speed, as well as the target’s Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Hit Points or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaves as a Bonus Action. When the possession ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target, and the target is immune to this ghost’s Possession for 24 hours.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Possession for 24 hours.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], it succeeds automatically.

Third Roar. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].
