mmShield00000000.name: Shield
mmShield00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmShieldBash0000.name: Shield Bash
mmShieldBash0000.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] [[lookup @range.units activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]]. that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmShieldedMind00.name: Shielded Mind
mmShieldedMind00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s thoughts can’t be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.

mmShieldofFaith0.name: Shield of Faith
mmShieldofFaith0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]{Shield of Faith}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmShimmeringShie.name: Shimmering Shield
mmShimmeringShie.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets itself or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] feet of itself. The target gains [[/healing average temp]], and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmShockwaveOfGlo.name: Shockwave of Glory
mmShockwaveOfGlo.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmShriek00000000.name: Shriek
mmShriek00000000.description: Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] or a source of Bright Light moves within [[lookup @range.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a shriek audible within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of itself for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

mmSickeningRay00.name: Sickening Ray
mmSickeningRay00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofSickn]{Ray of Sickness} (level 2 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmSickeningVapor.name: Sickening Vapors
mmSickeningVapor.description: Sickening Vapors. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sickening Vapors for 24 hours.

mmSiegeMonster00.name: Siege Monster
mmSiegeMonster00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

mmSilverSword000.name: Silver Sword
mmSilverSword000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Critical Hit: If the target is in an astral body (as with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAstralProj]{Astral Projection} spell), the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body instead of dealing damage.

mmSlayingBow0000.name: Slaying Bow
mmSlayingBow0000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] [[lookup @range.units activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]]. Failure: If the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSleep000000000.name: Sleep
mmSleep000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000] spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmSleepBreath000.name: Sleep Breath
mmSleepBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZma0lCmQeTuVuAL]] minute. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

mmSleepGaze00000.name: Sleep Gaze
mmSleepGaze00000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] feet (Constructs and Undead succeed automatically).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @labels.duration activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sleep Gaze for 24 hours.

mmSlow0000000000.name: Slow
mmSlow0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

mmSlowingBreath0.name: Slowing Breath
mmSlowingBreath0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target can’t take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

mmSmeltingCharge.name: Smelting Charge
mmSmeltingCharge.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and [[lookup @range.special activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]

Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters a creature’s space for the first time during this move, that target is subjected to the following effect.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]); if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] already has a creature Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition instead.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing no extra movement.

mmSmite000000000.name: Smite
mmSmite000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Radiant Ray attack.

mmSmokeBomb00000.name: Smoke Bomb
mmSmokeBomb00000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a bomb to a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]] feet of itself.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]]-foot-radius [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]] centered on that point.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmSmother0000000.name: Smother
mmSmother0000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can give it the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. [[lookup @name lowercase]] rug can smother only one creature at a time.

While grappling the target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

mmSonicBoom00000.name: Sonic Boom
mmSonicBoom00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShatter000]{Shatter}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmSoulBag0000000.name: Soul Bag
mmSoulBag0000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new bag after 7 days.

mmSoulGem0000000.name: Soul Gem
mmSoulGem0000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magical gem. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed while the gem is on the same plane of existence as it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a new body in [[/r 1d20]] days, regaining all its Hit Points and appearing within 5 feet of the gem.

The gem is a Tiny object that has AC 20; HP 50; and Immunity to Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The gem regains all its Hit Points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the gem is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new one by completing an 8-hour ritual using a gem worth 1,000+ GP and by expending 5,000 GP, which the ritual consumes.

mmSoulTome000000.name: Soul Tome
mmSoulTome000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic tome. While holding or carrying the tome, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Banishing Claw action.

The tome has AC 17; HP 35; and Immunity to Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The tome regains all its Hit Points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points or when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the tome is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new one when it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

mmSpeakWithBeast.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
mmSpeakWithBeast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

mmSpeakWithFrogs.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
mmSpeakWithFrogs.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

mmSpectralClaw00.name: Spectral Claw
mmSpectralClaw00.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmSpectralJaws00.name: Spectral Jaws
mmSpectralJaws00.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSpellImmunity0.name: Spell Immunity
mmSpellImmunity0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical choices include @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeatMetal0]{Heat Metal}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

mmSpellReflectio.name: Spell Reflection
mmSpellReflectio.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]]

Response—Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSpellStoring00.name: Spell Storing
mmSpellStoring00.description: A spellcaster who wears the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s amulet can cause the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster’s spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

mmSpellcasting00.name: Spellcasting
mmSpellcasting00.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no {type} components and using {ability} as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: {spell}

{count}/Day Each: {spell}

mmSpiderClimb000.name: Spider Climb
mmSpiderClimb000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

mmSpiritJar00000.name: Spirit Jar
mmSpiritJar00000.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms in [[/r 1d10]] days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s lair.

mmSpiritWail0000.name: Spirit Wail
mmSpiritWail0000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the creature has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmSpiritualWeapo.name: Spiritual Weapon
mmSpiritualWeapo.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon} spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmSpitefulEscape.name: Spiteful Escape
mmSpitefulEscape.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points, it dies only if it is within 30 feet of its anathema (a thing the DM chooses as the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s most hated thing). Otherwise, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point and teleports to a harmless demiplane, and it can’t return to the plane it left for [[/r 2d6]] days. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports away, each creature within 60 feet of the space it left is cursed. Until the curse ends, a creature has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows its location anywhere in the multiverse.

mmSplit000000000.name: Split
mmSplit000000000.description:
Trigger: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]]

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] splits into two new [[lookup @name capitalize]]. Each new [[lookup @name lowercase]] is one size smaller than the original [[lookup @name lowercase]] and acts on its Initiative. The original [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new [[lookup @name lowercase]]s (round down).

mmSporeBomb00000.name: Spore Bomb
mmSporeBomb00000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] feet].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Success: Half damage only.

mmSpores00000000.name: Spores
mmSpores00000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes [[/damage average activity=ukZveNVmvvtwbDj0]] at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

mmStakeToTheHear.name: Stake to the Heart
mmStakeToTheHear.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

mmStandingLeap00.name: Standing Leap
mmStandingLeap00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

mmStealBody00000.name: Steal Body
mmStealBody00000.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]]

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] possesses the target, consumes its brain, and teleports inside its skull.

While there, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; its understanding of Deep Speech; its telepathy; and its Detect Intelligence trait. It otherwise adopts the target’s game statistics. It knows everything the target knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must leave it. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

By spending 5 feet of its movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies unless its brain is restored before the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmSteamBreath000.name: Steam Breath
mmSteamBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

mmStench00000000.name: Stench
mmStench00000000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]], any creature (other than a [[lookup @name lowercase]]) that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour.

mmStenchSpray000.name: Stench Spray
mmStenchSpray000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=MD1NjuNJfDjxKGrL]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MD1NjuNJfDjxKGrL]] the [[lookup @name]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=MD1NjuNJfDjxKGrL]] feet. Failure: The target is coated in a foul-smelling liquid, exudes a stench for [[/r 1d4]] hours, and has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition while the stench lasts. Other creatures have the Poisoned condition while in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the coated target. The target can remove the stench on itself if it bathes during a Short or Long Rest.

mmStickyNet00000.name: Sticky Net
mmStickyNet00000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] the kuo-toa can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the net is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage). A creature can take an action to make a [[/skill ath 10]] check to free itself or another creature in a net within 5 feet, destroying the net on a success.

mmStickyShield00.name: Sticky Shield
mmStickyShield00.description: Trigger: A creature misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack roll using a weapon. Response—Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A8a55LxaAvNmIUnj]], the triggering creature. Failure: The attack’s weapon sticks to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s shield. If the target doesn’t let go of the weapon, the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition while the weapon is stuck (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). While stuck, the weapon can’t be used. The target can take an action to make a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]], freeing the weapon on a success.

mmStomp000000000.name: Stomp
mmStomp000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks], and it can make one Slam attack at any point during that move.

mmStormBolt00000.name: Storm Bolt
mmStormBolt00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmStrangeScepter.name: Strange Scepter
mmStrangeScepter.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. [[/damage average extended]].

mmStunningScreec.name: Stunning Screech
mmStunningScreec.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons succeed automatically).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmSuccubusForm00.name: Succubus Form
mmSuccubusForm00.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSuccubus000000]{Succubus}, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

mmSuffocate00000.name: Suffocate
mmSuffocate00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target is &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{suffocating}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have up to two targets Grappled in this way at a time.

mmSunRay00000000.name: Sun Ray
mmSunRay00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmSunSickness000.name: Sun Sickness
mmSunSickness000.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if it spends more than 1 hour in sunlight.

mmSunlight000000.name: Sunlight
mmSunlight000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage]] damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

mmSunlightHypers.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
mmSunlightHypers.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage]] damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

mmSunlightSensit.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
mmSunlightSensit.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

mmSunlightWeakne.name: Sunlight Weakness
mmSunlightWeakne.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

mmSuperiorInvisi.name: Superior Invisibility
mmSuperiorInvisi.description: The dragon casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmSurge000000000.name: Surge
mmSurge000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmSwallow0000000.name: Swallow
mmSwallow0000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature swallowed at a time).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swallows the target, which is no longer Grappled. While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

mmSwarm000000000.name: Swarm
mmSwarm000000000.description: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a {creature size and type}. The swarm can’t regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

mmSwarmOfGraspin.name: Swarm of Grasping Hands
mmSwarmOfGraspin.description: [[/attack extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]]. [[/damage average extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]], or [[/damage average activity=hzeHzcSKHC4AvIJQ]] damage if the swarm is &Reference[Bloodied apply=false]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmSwarmOfProbosc.name: Swarm of Proboscises
mmSwarmOfProbosc.description: [[/attack extended activity=RkmvpUI0spboBnYE]]. [[/damage average extended activity=RkmvpUI0spboBnYE]], or [[/damage average activity=Mgyp5Wa3cgoXX3N4]] damage if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=Mgyp5Wa3cgoXX3N4]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature in the swarm’s space, the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.acr.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target takes [[/damage average activity=n1k1Xq0kdB79VrOI]] damage at the end of each of its turns.

mmSwoop000000000.name: Swoop
mmSwoop000000000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a creature Grappled, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to half its Fly Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and drops that creature.

mmTacticalCharge.name: Tactical Charge
mmTacticalCharge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed straight toward an enemy it can see without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

mmTail0000000000.name: Tail
mmTail0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a {size} or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTailSwipe00000.name: Tail Swipe
mmTailSwipe00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

mmTelekineticThr.name: Telekinetic Thrust
mmTelekineticThr.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to [[lookup @range.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] [[lookup @range.units activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]]. straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmTelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
mmTelepathicBond.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is on the same plane of existence as its master, the two of them can communicate telepathically with each other.

mmTelepathicShro.name: Telepathic Shroud
mmTelepathicShro.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s thoughts can’t be read by any means, and magic can’t detect its location or observe it remotely.

mmTeleport000000.name: Teleport
mmTeleport000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

mmTendril0000000.name: Tendril
mmTendril0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmTentacle000000.name: Tentacle
mmTentacle000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a {size} or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of {count} tentacles.

mmTentacleLash00.name: Tentacle Lash
mmTentacleLash00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two tentacles, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmTentacleSlam00.name: Tentacle Slam
mmTentacleSlam00.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

mmTentacles00000.name: Tentacles
mmTentacles00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from all four tentacles.

mmTerrifyingGlar.name: Terrifying Glare
mmTerrifyingGlar.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=KjYVnRenWyJHktzg]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KjYVnRenWyJHktzg]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Frightened, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmTerrifyingPres.name: Terrifying Presence
mmTerrifyingPres.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SVb8yS9ewkeZpP2R]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SVb8yS9ewkeZpP2R]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SVb8yS9ewkeZpP2R]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: Half damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmThirdRoar00000.name: Third Roar
mmThirdRoar00000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ZRjg6wwKf090U1zB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ZRjg6wwKf090U1zB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ZRjg6wwKf090U1zB]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=ZRjg6wwKf090U1zB]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=ZRjg6wwKf090U1zB]] damage only.

mmThrash00000000.name: Thrash
mmThrash00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmThunderbolt000.name: Thunderbolt
mmThunderbolt000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmThunderclap000.name: Thunderclap
mmThunderclap000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmThunderousBell.name: Thunderous Bellow
mmThunderousBell.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmTongueTwister0.name: Tongue Twister
mmTongueTwister0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. If the target fails its saving throw, it is cursed until the end of its next turn. Until the curse ends, the target can’t cast spells with a Verbal component, and when it speaks, it says the opposite of what it means.

mmTouch000000000.name: Touch
mmTouch000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object that isn’t being worn or carried, it starts burning.

mmToxicEscape000.name: Toxic Escape
mmToxicEscape000.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the attack’s damage to itself (round down), and it teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]] feet of itself.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]], each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s destination space.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, it has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

mmToxicInk000000.name: Toxic Ink
mmToxicInk000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is underwater.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then moves up to its Speed.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmTraining000000.name: Training
mmTraining000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has proficiency in one skill of the DM’s choice and has Advantage whenever it makes an ability check using that skill.

mmTrample0000000.name: Trample
mmTrample0000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] feet that has the Prone condition.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmTramplingCharg.name: Trampling Charge
mmTramplingCharg.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and can move through the spaces of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]]. Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]] whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters is targeted once by the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTransparent000.name: Transparent
mmTransparent000.description: Even when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is in plain sight, a creature must succeed on a [[/check dc=15 ability=wis skill=prc format=long]] to notice the [[lookup @name lowercase]] if the creature hasn’t witnessed the [[lookup @name lowercase]] move or otherwise act.

mmTrashLob000000.name: Trash Lob
mmTrashLob000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmTreasureSense0.name: Treasure Sense
mmTreasureSense0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of itself.

mmTreeClub000000.name: Tree Club
mmTreeClub000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTreeStride0000.name: Tree Stride
mmTreeStride0000.description: If within [[lookup @range.value activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] feet of a [[lookup @range.special activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space within [[lookup @range.value activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] feet of a second [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] that is within 60 feet of the previous tree.

mmTrollSpawn0000.name: Troll Spawn
mmTrollSpawn0000.description: The limb uncannily has the same senses as a whole [[lookup @name lowercase]]. If the limb isn’t destroyed within 24 hours, roll [[/r 1d12#On a 12, the limb turns into a troll]]{roll 1d12}. On a 12, the limb turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmTroll000000000]{Troll}. Otherwise, the limb withers away.

mmTunneler000000.name: Tunneler
mmTunneler000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

mmTusk0000000000.name: Tusk
mmTusk0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra [[/damage average activity=M8zolxGeUsp7MCgI]] damage and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmUmbralDagger00.name: Umbral Dagger
mmUmbralDagger00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes Stable but has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmUmbralStrike00.name: Umbral Strike
mmUmbralStrike00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Grave Strike or Sickening Ray attack.

mmUncannyDodge00.name: Uncanny Dodge
mmUncannyDodge00.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=NzfYZzkrG4qJ13to]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack.

mmUndeadFortitud.name: Undead Fortitude
mmUndeadFortitud.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

mmUndeadRestorat.name: Undead Restoration
mmUndeadRestorat.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed before it atones for its evil, it gains a new body in [[/r 1d10]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in a location significant to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmUnicornsBlessi.name: Unicorn's Blessing
mmUnicornsBlessi.description: The [[lookup @name]] touches another creature with its horn and casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmUnnervingGaze0.name: Unnerving Gaze
mmUnnervingGaze0.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

mmUnsettlingVisa.name: Unsettling Visage
mmUnsettlingVisa.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], it succeeds automatically.

mmVampireWeaknes.name: Vampire Weakness
mmVampireWeaknes.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

mmVampiricConnec.name: Vampiric Connection
mmVampiricConnec.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s senses.

mmVanish00000000.name: Vanish
mmVanish00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its light have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s &Reference[Concentration] ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an attack roll or uses Consume Life.

mmVeilOfShadow00.name: Veil of Shadow
mmVeilOfShadow00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shadow Stealth, and [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]]. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmVengefulGlare0.name: Vengeful Glare
mmVengefulGlare0.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]], it succeeds automatically. If the Frightened target is cursed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (see [[/item .LuIttybjU4f7tGCs]]), the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration.

mmVileAppearance.name: Vile Appearance
mmVileAppearance.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]], any [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s true form.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrific Appearance for 24 hours.

mmVortex00000000.name: Vortex
mmVortex00000000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space. Failure: [[/damage average activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target can’t cast spells with a Verbal component and takes [[/damage average activity=kDz92inkRCjGrPiz]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turns.

mmVowofRevenge00.name: Vow of Revenge
mmVowofRevenge00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] curses one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=NBJRR41fIGp8FYJh]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=NBJRR41fIGp8FYJh]] feet of itself. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the distance to and direction of the cursed target, even if it is on a different plane of existence. The curse ends on the target if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses this Bonus Action on a different creature.

mmWarCry00000000.name: War Cry
mmWarCry00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uN0VTW2Fqig7YAs9]] of its choice that can see or hear it gains [[/healing average temp]] and has Advantage on attack rolls until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmWardingCharm00.name: Warding Charm
mmWardingCharm00.description:
Trigger: A creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTaurVqDcUSvviyB]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack roll misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmWarpStep000000.name: Warp Step
mmWarpStep000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports, along with [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]] of its choice within [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]] of it, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]] feet [[lookup @range.special activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]].

mmWarpingHex0000.name: Warping Hex
mmWarpingHex0000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the target.  Since the Exhaustion condition can be applied multiple times, the Active Effect must be dragged from this item’s Effects tab onto the target item’s sheet after the initial application of the Exhaustion condition.

mmWaterBound0000.name: Water Bound
mmWaterBound0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

mmWaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
mmWaterBreathing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for {duration} outside water.

mmWaterForm00000.name: Water Form
mmWaterForm00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmWaterJet000000.name: Water Jet
mmWaterJet000000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]]-foot-wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only.

mmWaterSusceptib.name: Water Susceptibility
mmWaterSusceptib.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage damage for every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

Foundry Note

Scaling is configured to roll the correct number of dice based on the distance traveled through water. 1 is default for 5 feet, 2 is for 10 feet, and so forth.

mmWateryRebuke00.name: Watery Rebuke
mmWateryRebuke00.description: Trigger: An enemy the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response—Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]], the triggering enemy. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by conjured water.

mmWateryRush0000.name: Watery Rush
mmWateryRush0000.description: While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=xoYfePV5epjJkYHX]] without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

mmWeakeningBreat.name: Weakening Breath
mmWeakeningBreat.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]], each creature that isn’t currently affected by this breath in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]] minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmWeb00000000000.name: Web
mmWeb00000000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

mmWebStrand00000.name: Web Strand
mmWebStrand00000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]], one Large or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

mmWebWalker00000.name: Web Walker
mmWebWalker00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

mmWeightOfYears0.name: Weight of Years
mmWeightOfYears0.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] feet. Failure: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears [[/r 3d10]] years older. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmWeirdInsight00.name: Weird Insight
mmWeirdInsight00.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] feet. Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

mmWhelm000000000.name: Whelm
mmWhelm000000000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes [[/damage average activity=khxVwH3AB0sx1qRG]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]].

Success: Half damage only.

mmWhirlwind00000.name: Whirlwind
mmWhirlwind00000.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]], each Medium or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only.

mmWhirlwindOfSan.name: Whirlwind of Sand
mmWhirlwindOfSan.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 2 to its AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. Each creature of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. of its destination space has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmWindJavelin000.name: Wind Javelin
mmWindJavelin000.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Hit or Miss: The javelin magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmWindStaff00000.name: Wind Staff
mmWindStaff00000.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmWishes00000000.name: Wishes
mmWishes00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30 percent} chance of knowing the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can understand. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the spell for the creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] suffers none of the spell’s stress. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has cast it three times, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t do so again for 365 days.

mmWitchStrike000.name: Witch Strike
mmWitchStrike000.description: Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=H15XAJ5lhXfk1d4v]] cursed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and within [[lookup @range.value activity=H15XAJ5lhXfk1d4v]] [[lookup @range.units activity=H15XAJ5lhXfk1d4v]]. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmWorldshakingMo.name: World-Shaking Movement
mmWorldshakingMo.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed. At the end of this movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates an instantaneous shock wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]. Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area lose &Reference[Concentration] and, if Medium or smaller, have the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.
